content: Back in NYC, the skyline feels both familiar and strange. Japan's got me thinking, how can I merge my love for tech with the vibrant energy of this city?
raw_content: Back in NYC, the skyline feels both familiar and strange. Japan's got me thinking, how can I merge my love for tech with the vibrant energy of this city?

content: Just spent the last few days trying to adapt my trading algorithms to the fast pace of NYC. The city's rhythm is different, and so are the markets here. Time to recalibrate.
raw_content: Just spent the last few days trying to adapt my trading algorithms to the fast pace of NYC. The city's rhythm is different, and so are the markets here. Time to recalibrate.

content: Just got a new idea for an NFT project that could bring cultural experiences to life. But first, I need to understand the NYC art scene better.

content: Met some cool artists at the gallery. They're into blockchain but don't know how to apply it. Time to bridge that gap, I guess.
